title: The Hill's 12:30 Report: Trump sought control of voting machines

title: William Barr says Trump 'actively sabotaged' Republicans with 'spiteful conduct' in the 2021 Georgia runoffs

author: Mychael Schnell
title: Perdue says he 'misunderstood' Trump supporters' 'lock him up' chants about Kemp

sentence: Other races like Oz's race in Pennsylvania and the Georgia gubernatorial race, in which Trump has backed former Senator David Perdue over incumbent Brian Kemp, could indicate how much weight the former president still carries with many Republicans, Newsweek reported.
author: Aaron McDade
title: Donald Trump: U.S. 'Going to Hell' Because of Election Fraud
